title: Columbia County Public Health (Columbia County Commissioners)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Katherine roughton’s resignation letter/termination letter. 

email communications between  commissioners and Katherine Roughton from 03/01/23 - 09/01/23- all communications. email communications between jasmine helm and Katherine Roughton discussing other employees from dates 06/01/22-09/01/23 

Complaints to commissioners by county employee staff concerning Beth Compton from from 01/01/23-to termination 

All complaints to commissioners and HR including emails notes memos documents from April 2022-September 2023 concerning Katherine Roughton

Email communications between Katherine Roughton and commissioner Chuck Amerien from 04/01/22-through 01/23

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lizbeth Salander
